Description: Posted by  Anjar Adrianus Kesharyadi 2nd  Talent Acquisition at Bukalapak | Hiring For Tech Position!  Send InMail  PT Buka Investasi Bersama (BIB) is subsidiaries of PT Bukalapak concentrated in offering investment products for various customer segments. In December 2020, BIB received external fundings from Ashmore as part of our commitment to grow further our business in investment space.  Existing offerings of BIB are in mutual funds and digital gold business, yet BIB has more exciting plan moving forwards to strengthen our footprint in investment areas.  As subsidiary company, BIB received dedicated support from Bukalapak in terms of technology, product and talent. From employee perspective, BIB employees have similar career ladder, personal growth and leadership experience since we are fully supervised and advised by BL team as well.     Job Description  Design, develop, improve, and deploy high quality backend services and APIs. Write unit tests to ensure safety net of regression tests for effective refactoring. Within a cross-functional team, collaborate with other engineers specializing in backend services, web frontend, mobile apps, and test automation, as well as product design and ideation. Apply design patterns and design principles to produce maintainable and easy to extend code. Learn multiple tech stacks to use the best tools for the job.     Requirements  What you need to have (i.e., Minimum Qualifications)  Bachelor degree in Computer Science or related fields, or equivalent professional experience in software development. Humble culture, zero egos, and excellent collaborative spirit. We are all here to learn together and grow together as a team. Eagerness to learn, eagerness to help, eagerness to share. Firm grasp of algorithms, algorithmic complexities, design patterns and principles, clean code, and pragmatic aspects of programming.  What would make you stand out from the crowd (i.e., Preferred Qualifications)  Masters degree, further education in Computer Science or Software Engineering, or equivalently extensive professional experience in software development. Knowledge and experience in Ruby, Go, Java, C/C++, Python, or Elixir/Erlang. Firm grasp in object-oriented, functional, or event-driven programming practices. Experience in building large-scale web apps/services/APIs. Solid understanding of SQL, Redis, MongoDB, Cassandra, or ElasticSearch, and the performance costs associated with queries.

About The Role  If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to hone your Golang and distributed system skills, look no further. As our Senior Software Engineer for the Experimentation Team, you will be handed the reins to build a Campaign Management Platform. Along with building services to query billions of rows in Google’s BigQuery, you will be in charge of buillding scalable APIs to build user segments and evolve architecture to send millions of notifications through varied streams like Email, SMS, in-app notifications per day. Working closely with the Data Analytics team, Data Engineers, you will get to contribute to the system that runs campaigns efficiently for Gojek. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to provide APIs for Gojek millions of users and driver partners to use.  What You Will Do   Be responsible for the overall solution architecture of the products/services that you will be working on Code, design, prototype, perform reviews and consult in the process of building highly scalable, reliable, and fault-tolerant systems As our senior technologist continuously refactor applications and architectures to maintain high-quality levels Continue to stay abreast of the latest technologies in distributed systems, caching and research new technologies, tools that enable building the next generation systems Act as an engineer that enjoys writing readable, concise, reusable, extensible code every day Discuss, articulate requirements with product management and scope, execute the feature road map Participate in team’s hiring process by being a panelist in interviews  What You Will Need  At least 4+ years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, testing, and deploying large scale applications, microservices in any language or stack (preferably Golang) Deep knowledge in one or more of these areas: Cloud, NoSQL stores; we use Google Cloud, Kubernetes, BigQuery, Kafka extensively while our primary languages are Golang Strong understanding in either of HTTP or gRPC protocol and serialization formats like Protobuf Excellent attitude and passion working in a team with willingness to learn Experience in building low latency, high volume REST API requests handling Experience in working with relational databases (like Postgres) Experience in working in distributed caches like Redis Experience in containerization technologies like Docker, Kubernetes Experience working in any cloud platforms (AWS, Azure etc.) preferably GCP Ability to Get Stuff Done!  Bonus Points If  Experience working in CRM, or API systems at scale Worked with Golang, gRPC, Redis Experience in NoSQL stores (like Cassandra, Clickhouse, BigQuery)  About The Team  Our Data Engineering (DE) team has over 40 talented folks based in Bengaluru and Jakarta. At Gojek, our products generate a tremendous amount of data, but that’s only step one. We’re constantly making use of that data by giving value back to our customers, merchant-partners, and driver-partners in the form of recommendations and other customizations. Our team is responsible for building the platform and products to manage the entire lifecycle of data.  As a team, we are concerned with not only the growth of the company, but each other’s personal growth and well being too. Along with our desire to utilize smart technology and innovative engineering strategies to make people’s lives easier, our team also bonds over our shared love for all kinds of tea, movies & TV shows. With WFH becoming more normalized, you best believe we have been prioritizing a healthy work-life balance at home.  About Us  Gojek is a Super App. It’s one app for ordering food, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, and dozen other products. It is Indonesia’s first and only decacorn. It's also the only Southeast Asian startup to be part of Fortune's list of 'Companies That Changed The World.'  Our Mission: To create and scale positive socio-economic impact for our customers, driver-partners, business and MSMEs.  As of 2021, Gojek processed more than $9 billion annualised gross transaction value across all markets where it operates - in Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam and Indonesia. We have the largest food delivery product in Asia, (outside of China), and the largest payments wallet in Southeast Asia.  Our investors include Google, Facebook, PayPal, Sequoia Capital, Tencent Holdings among others.  Gojek is committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace and is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, education status, or any other legally protected status.

Job_Title: Senior/ Staff Software Engineer – Data/ Backend (Bangkok based – Relocation provided)
